org.dblp.mmdb

Class Record

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dblp.mmdb.Record
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Person, Publication, Redirect

    public abstract class Record
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract base class for dblp records. This class implements several default implementations for storing records as and retrieving data from a space-efficient representation of a dblp record.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      protected PersonName[] names
      The person names referenced in this record.
      protected static java.nio.charset.Charset UTF8
      The UTF-8 charset constant.
      protected byte[] xml
      The dblp record as space-efficient compressed XML byte array.

      • dblp

        protected MmdbInterface dblp
        The MMDB.

      • key

        protected java.lang.String key
        The key of this record.

      • mdate

        protected int mdate
        Integer representation of an mdate. String "yyyy-mm-dd" is stores as integer 
        mdate = yyyy * 10000 + mm * 100 + dd
        .

      • xml

        protected byte[] xml
        The dblp record as space-efficient compressed XML byte array.

        The person names referenced in this record.

    • Method Detail

      • numberOfNames

        public int numberOfNames()
        The number of PersonNames stored in this record.
        Returns:
        The number of PersonNames.

      • nameAt

        public PersonName nameAt(int index)
        Retrieves the PersonName at the specified index. An index ranges from 0 to getNumberOfNames() - 1.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the PersonName.
        Returns:
        The PersonName at the specified index of this record.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range (index < 0 || index >= getNumberOfNames())

      • getNames

        public java.util.List<PersonName> getNames()
        Retrieves an unmodifiable List view of the person names in this record.
        Returns:
        The person names as unmodifiable List.

        The stream of person names.

      • hasAdditionalAttribute

        public boolean hasAdditionalAttribute()
        Checks whether this record's root element has any attributes beside the mandatory 'key' and 'mdate' attributes.
        Returns:
        true if the root element has any attributes, otherwise false.

      • getAttributes

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAttributes()
        Get a (name,value) map of all attributes in this record's root element.
        Returns:
        The (name,value) map.

      • attributes

        public java.util.stream.Stream<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> attributes()
        Returns a sequential Stream of the (name,value) map entries of all attributes in this record's root element.
        Returns:
        The stream of map entries.

      • recordAttributes

        protected java.lang.String recordAttributes()
        Returns a standardized XML fragment for the mandatory 'key' and 'mdate' attributes for this record; including the leading space, but without the closing '>'.
        Returns:
        The XML fragment.

      • fillPlaceholderTag

        protected void fillPlaceholderTag(java.lang.StringBuilder sb,
                                  int pos,
                                  java.lang.String tag,
                                  java.lang.String value)
        Injects the given tag at the given position in the StringBuilder object, overwriting the single placeholder digit at pos+1. Also injects the closing tag. Between opening and closing tag, value is inserted with '&','<','>' characters escaped.
        Parameters:
        sb - The StringBuilder.
        pos - The position of the opening < of the compressed placeholder tag.
        tag - The actual tag name to inject.
        value - The text content.

      • xmlBuild

        protected java.lang.StringBuilder xmlBuild()
        Build and return the complete dblp XML element of this record as a String from the compressed byte array stored in this record.
        Returns:
        The complete dblp record as a String.

      • getXml

        public abstract java.lang.String getXml()
        Return the dblp XML element of this record as a String.
        Returns:
        The dblp record as a String.

        public FieldReader getFieldReader()
        Returns a FieldReader for this record.
        Returns:
        The FieldReader.

        The stream of Fields.
